FAQ

Can I bring my pets?

We always want to welcome them to the bar, but make sure you have a BC SPCA Comox Valley Community Animal Centre medical license, we always want to create the best environment for both the pets and our guests.

What if I'm allergic to cats or dogs?

We have separate areas for dog lovers and cat lovers, besides we also have private areas for customers jsut come for coffee.

Why is there a fee to visit the store?

While our primary goal is to provide you with a unique environment to fall in love with your next 'fur baby', we do charge a nominal fee to help pay for the beautiful space and care for the pets.

How do I adopt one of the resident kitties?

There are many places to help you achieve this dream, we recommend you visit https://www.woofys.ca/rescues, and https://www.petfinder.com/search/dogs-for-adoption/ ca / british-columbia / courtenay /

Birthday Parties

We would love to help you celebrate your PURRthday! If you bring a group of 10 or more, the birthday person will receive a complimentary visit. Reservations can be booked online for up to 12 guests. If you would like to book up to 16 guests (the full room), please make a note of it in your reservation comments. We also have delicious cupcakes that are PURRfect for a party, and can special order some for your group with a few days notice. We kindly ask that guests not bring in outside food or drinks. We do ask birthday parties with young guests have one adult for every 3-4 children present in the store with them. Please note that we are unable to guarantee a table in the cafe as reservations are for the Doggo & Catto only, but often tables become available once the next group of guests goes in to the Kitty Kingdom. For further inquiries, email us at reservations@doggovscattocoffee.com

Private Events

Looking for the PURRfect event for your bachelorette party, team building, or milestone celebration? We can offer semi-private events that will be sure to delight all your furriends. Book the whole Doggo & Catto for you and your guests for a private visit with the pets (up to 16 guests) $150/45 minutes. For further inquiries, email us at reservations@doggovscattocoffee.com

Is the Doggo & Catto Coffee wheelchair accessible?

Absolutely! We are fully wheelchair accessible in our store. It was our goal to create a space that all our furriends could enjoy.

Can I surrender my pet to Doggo & Catto Coffee ?

Unfortunately we are not able to take in rescue cats here at our store. All our pets arrive in tip-top health from BC SPCA Comox Valley Community Animal Centre and introduction of an outside pet would put them at risk. We recommend reaching out to the local Calgary rescues to see who is able to accept your kitty for surrender.

Why are the cats and dogs separate from the cafe?

We have worked closely with BC SPCA Comox Valley Community Animal Centre to design a space that is safe and healthy for our guests. This is why we have a completely separate are called the Doggo & Catto Coffee for our pets to relax and play. We also have special doors for intake and adoptions so no kitty will go through our cafe at any point. We strive to have the cleanest and healthiest cafe for our guests, and this helps ensure that all food and drink is free from kitty hair.
